reviews.review:
O jogo é incrível, principalmente quando jogado com amigos. A variedade de Killer é bem grande, e cada Killer tem sua própria vocação, então é bem difícil você saber jogar com todos, pois além de cada um ter sua mecânica, você pode aprender macetes, e criar Builds de Perks e Addons que mais se adaptam ao seu estilo de jogo.  O tempo de fila até achar a partida é rapida, talvez demore um pouco no começo (Por volta do rank 20), porém conforme você vai progredindo, mais rápida é a busca de partida.
O único problema é a falta de competitividade, o jogo é extremamente casual, pois você sobe de Rank e não ganha nada além de orgulho próprio.

Caso você seja um novato, recomendo assistir a live/videos do Flyrie

Despite its many issues Dead by Daylight continues to be one of the greatest games I have played. With a huge variety of characters on either side, as well as the appeal of choosing to be the hunter or the hunted, it never fails to deliver a thrill that I have yet to find in another game even while trying multiple other games "similar" to it such as Resident Evil and F13. 

Still one of my favorites, even though I dont play much anymore, this game will always hold a place in my heart.
Zagrajcie 4 mecze i nie będziecie mieli pytań dlaczego negatywna recenzja

Imagine releasing a new DLC to sell to your customers to get money, but you break the game with more bugs which you're refusing to fix.

It has been a month and they still haven't haven't fixed the bugs they themselves introduces.

I believe that we will get something akin to R6S "Operation Health" on this game.

For those who do not know in 2 months they were supposed to improve the game and fix bugs they broke the game even further somehow.

Es un buen juego al cual te puedes viciar y no arrepentirte de ello, siempre pasa algo nuevo, bueno, casi siempre.

Exceptuando el infierno que pasaras los primeros 8 rangos como superviviente.

Игру я рекомендую. Конечно сначала возможно будете бомбить, но со временем вы научитесь и будете играть лучше всех. С недавним обновлением я захотела чаще играть в эту игру. Конечно, мне не очень новые анимации выживших, но всё же, это лучше чем ничего. Больше всего мне нравится обновление интерфейса и карт, которые теперь выглядат очень реалестично. Буду ждать новых обновлений!!

Malheureusement le jeu force les joueurs a jouer de façon ''compétitif'' ce qui détruit totalement le but du jeu a savoir : s'amusé sur un jeu où le véritable but est de placer une ambiance de Slasher. 

Le système de ranking est complétement con donc alors qu'un simple système de : 
ranking d'un coté. 
game chill de l'autre. 

serai simple a faire, mais bon comme ils savent très bien qu'ils ont pas assez de joueur pour faire tourner ne serais ce que les ranking (on ce demande pourquoi) ils ne le feront jamais. 
Bref attendez vous a ne jamais pouvoir jouer tueur (sauf si vous voulez attendre 30min dans la file d'attente) 
et a passé des games qui en dureront moins. 

N'achetez pas le jeu, sauf si vous avez 4 autre potes avec qui jouez en game privé.

Dead by Daylight(DBD) is a horror based game that gives you the opportunity to choose roles of a survivor or brutal killer. Dead by Daylight is a game where the survivor role must do various tasks(fixing generations, destroying totems and opening gates to escape) while being hunted down by a fierce killer trying to prevent you from escaping! With Dead by Daylight being a horror game this gives a great opportunity for horror elements and people that enjoy the horror genre, Dead by Daylight has various crossovers with original horror elements such as ‘A Nightmare on Elm Street’, ‘SAW’, ‘Stranger Things’, ‘Halloween’ and many more! The game also includes a wide variety of customization towards Killers and Survivors which gives you  a lot unique looks for your killer or survivor! 

This game recently introduced Cross-Platforms to those playing Dead by Daylight on Console or PC which gave the DBD community a great way to play with their friends if they didn’t play on the gaming platform you played  on. Another major rework the Dead by Daylight Creators are bringing in is new Graphics to a lot of maps which brings in a more realistic and grotesque environment to play on. 

Overall I recommend Dead by Daylight to anyone interested in horror games or interested in playing with friends. It’s a “Pretty Good Job...so Far” !

Sehr stumpfes Spiel, mit sehr hohem Suchtpotenzial! 1 übermächtiger Killer gegen 4 normalos die versuchen von einem Areal zu entkommen. Mit verschiedenen Upgrades machen sich sowohl der Killer als auch die "Suvs" das Leben leichter. Einmal angefangen hört man damit nicht mehr auf!

장점: 다양한 애드온과 캐릭터마다 고유기술&전승 시스템으로 다양한 게임 변수 창출
예전 스타크래프트 유즈맵 톰과제리를 좋아하는 유저라면 무조건 구매하세요.
공포게임 좋아하면 구매 필수고 리얼한 여캐들의 비명소리가 예술입니다.

단점: 진입 장벽 너무 높다..... 생존자 하면 살인마들한테 뉴비들 다 썰려서 꼬접 많이함..ㅠㅠ
근데 이게 뉴비들이 너무 없어서 악순환이 계속됨 어쩔 수 없는 구조임..
逛街模拟器还是很耐玩的。
살인마로만 플레이하면서 얼마 안 했는데 고인물 4인팟만 만나는지 1명도 못잡고 다 보내줌 난 19랭인데 상대는 13랭크 4명이랑 매칭됨...진짜 이래도 되는거냐

初心者の人はいまいち楽しみづらいゲームだと思われます。
生存者でプレイする場合は板や発電機の場所などある程度数をこなして覚えていくとだんだん楽しくなってくると思います。欠点はマッチの遅さなどがあります。
殺人鬼でプレイする場合は素早くマッチできることが多いですが、生存者有利の環境や過疎化などの影響からランク20～18の初めたての殺人鬼でも赤帯の生存者とマッチしてしまうことが多々あります。この問題は時間帯をずらすなどの工夫をすればある程度緩和できると思います。
また、パークの取得にかかる時間が長く、途中でゲームをやめてしまう人も多いのではないでしょうか。
実況などを見て始めたいと思う人がいるならばいったん冷静になって検討することをお勧めします。
定価で買いたいと思うほどの魅力はあまり感じられないゲームでした。
